name: Assemble the Team
text: Uses (0 Bonds). Limit 1 per investigator. Attached asset does not take up an Ally slot. [reaction] When an investigator plays an Ally asset at your location: Place 1 resource on this card as a bond. If you own that Ally, this card is not attached to a card, and that Ally costs less than the number of bonds on this card. Then, reduce the cost of that Ally to 0, and attach this card to it.

name: Beseeching Prayer
text:
[reaction] After a skill test ends, if an [eldersign] was revealed during that test and Beseeching Prayer is unexhausted: Seal ([eldersign]).

[reaction] When a chaos token would be revealed from the chaos bag during a skill test at your location, exhaust Beseeching Prayer: Resolve the token sealed here, as if it were just revealed from the chaos bag. Then reveal another token.

name: Discarded Dogtags
text: [reaction] After you take 1 or more damage, exhaust Discarded Dogtags and take 1 damage: Gain 1 resource and heal 1 horror.

name: Close Quarters
text: Fight. Increase the difficulty of this test by 2. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed, this attack deals an additional +1 damage.

name: Distribute Supplies
text:
Each investigator may choose one - 

-  Spend 2 resources. Then, another investigator gains 3 resources.

-  Discard a card. Then, another investigator draws 1 card.

-  Discard 1 asset you control. Then, another investigator plays an asset. Reduce it's cost by 1.

name: Good Cap, Bad Cop
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test [combat] (3) or [intellect] (4). If you succeed and that enemy is Humanoid, discover 2 clues at your location. If they aren't and/or you fail, deal 1 damage to that enemy.

name: Absolute Focus
text: You get +1 [willpower], +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], and +1 [agility] during this skill test.

name: Insult
text: Fast. Choose a non-Elite enemy at your location with damage on it. Attach Insult to that enemy and move 1 damage on it to this card. [reaction] After the attached enemy is defeated: Draw 1 card and gain 2 resources.

name: Lie in Wait
text: [free] During the enemy phase, take an action as if it was your turn (this counts toward the number of actions you can take each turn and can provoke attacks of opportunity).

name: Rushed to the scene
text: Permanent. Limit 1 per deck. [reaction] Before you draw your opening hand: Search your deck for a Firearm asset with Uses (X ammo). Play it, reducing it's cost by 2, with 0 ammo on it. Shuffle your deck.

name: Good Cap, Bad Cop
text: Parley. Choose an enemy at your location and test [combat] (3) or [intellect] (4). If you succeed and that enemy is Humanoid, discover 2 clues at your location. If they aren't and/or you fail, deal 2 damage to that enemy.

name: "I'm too old for this sh..."
text: If you succeed this skill test, heal 1 horror and draw a card. If you fail, heal 2 horror instead.

name: Security Guard
text: Uses (1 supply). You get +1 [combat]. [reaction] After you perform a fight action, exhaust Security Guard: Place 1 supply on Security Guard. [free] Spend 3 supplies: Automatically evade a non-Elite enemy at your location.

name: Hunt them Down
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn. Max once per round.
You may take an additional 4 actions this turn. At the beginning of next round, you lose 3 - X actions, where X is the number of actions you chose to not take last round (minimum 0).

name: Insult
text:
Fast. Choose an enemy at your location with damage on it. Attach Insult to that enemy and move up to 3 damage on it to this card.

[reaction] When the attached enemy attacks Insult's owner: It deals 1 less horror for this attack..

[reaction] After the attached enemy is defeated: Draw 2 cards. Gain 2 resources for each damage on Insult.

name: "I'm Gonna Need a Bigger Gun."
text: You can only commit this card to a skill test you are performing on a Firearm asset. If you succeed, move all the ammo from that Firearm to this card. Discard that card and play a Firearm asset from you hand, reducing it's cost by the cost of the card you discarded. Move all ammo from this card to the played Firearm.

name: Dave Reacher
text:
Handlocked.
While the leftmost card in your hand is an event card: You get +1 [intellect]. Otherwise, you get +1 [willpower].

[free] Exhaust Dave Reacher: You may discard the leftmost card in your hand and draw a card. Otherwise, move that card to the rightmost position of your hand.

name: Laboratory Coat
text:
Handlocked.

Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
[free] During a skill test you can commit to, exhaust Laboratory Coat: The current leftmost card in your hand gains a [wild] icon during this test.

name: "Do as I do."
text:
Play after performing a skill test during an action.
Choose another investigator at your location. They perform a skill test of the same type as yours, without spending an action. If they succeed, you both gain 1 resource. Otherwise, you may take an additional action during your turn.

flavor:
"My head! Daisy was right.
This was a terrible idea."
name: Eldritch Research
text: Take 1 horror. Discard the top 6 card of your deck. Add up to 2 Insight cards discarded this way to your hand. Shuffle each weakness that was discarded by this effect back into your deck.

name: Following the Trail
text: Handlocked. While this card is in the right half of your hand, it gains fast. Investigate. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this investigation. If you succeed, you may move to a connecting location and discover a clue there, instead of discovering a clue at your current location.

name: Glint From Afar
text: Handlocked. Glint From Afar cannot be played. Forced Whenever Glint From Afar is the leftmost card in your hand: Draw a card. Then, shuffle Glint From Afar into your deck. [reaction] After you take a Move action: Discard this card and move an investigator at a connecting location to your location or visa versa.

name: Rampant Search
text: Investigate. Increase the difficulty of this test by 2. Add your [combat] value to your skill value for this investigation. If you succeed, discard a card from you hand and draw 2 cards.

name: Snooping Around
text:
Fast. Play only at the start of the mythos phase.
Search the top 9 cards of the encounter deck for an enemy, spawn it engaged with you, attach Snooping Around to it, and shuffle the encounter deck.

[reaction] When an investigator defeats an enemy with Snooping Around attached to it: Heal 1 horror. They discover 1 clue at their location.

name: Mysterious Scriptures
text: Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] for this investigation (+3 [intellect] if you have 2 or more Insight cards in your hand). If you succeed, after this test ends you may play an Insight event from your hand, reducing it's cost by 2.

flavor: "I just need to beat them at their own game."
name: Sinister Challenge
text: Reduce the cost to play Sinister Challenge by 1 for every 4 other cards in your hand. Investigate. Investigate with a base [intellect] value of 1. (If you have 8 or more cards in your hand, this test is automatically successful.) If you succeed, discover 2 total clues from among your location and connecting locations.

name: Seeing the Big Picture
text: Exceptional. Handlocked. While Seeing the Big Picture is in your hand, reduce the cost of Insight cards you play by 1. Forced At the end of the round, move Seeing the Big Picture 1 position to the left. When it becomes the the leftmost card in your hand: You must commit it to the next eligible skill test you perform.

name: Heather Freeman
text:
While you have at least 7 cards in hand you gain
+1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you discard a card from your hand or deck, exhaust Heather Freeman: Draw a card. You may discard the card you drew. If you do, draw a card.

name: Shroud of the Old Ones
text: [reaction] When an enemy would spawn at your location, exhaust Shroud of the Old Ones: Choose a connecting location with at least 1 clue on it. Then, test [intellect] (4). If you succeed, spawn that enemy at the chosen location instead, if able.

name: Timelocked
text: During the upkeep phase, you may choose to not draw a card. While you have no cards in your deck, you get +1 [willpower] , +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], +1 [agility] and may take an additional action during your turn. [reaction] After this card enters play: Discard your hand and draw 5 cards. Forced When a card effect would shuffle a non-weakness card into your deck, remove it from the game instead.

name: Bookkeeping
text:
If in your discard, there are at least...

- ...5 cards, you may draw a card.

- ...10 cards, your current location gets -1 shroud this round. 

- ...15 cards, discover 2 clues at your location.

- ...20 cards, discover 2 clues at any location.

name: Tome of Memories
text: You get +2 skill value while resolving skill tests on event cards. Forced At the start of your turn, add an Insight card from your discard to your hand. At the end of your turn, remove that card from the game.

name: Inner Lining
text:
Handlocked. Uses (3 supplies).
[reaction] When you play the card in the right half of your hand, spend 1 supply and exhaust Inner Lining: Place 1 supply or ammo on another asset card you control.

name: Oddly Shaped Key
text: Fast. Limit 1 per deck. [action] Investigate. If a +1, +0, or [eldersign] token is revealed during this test, attach Oddly Shaped Key to this location. Otherwise, return this card to your hand. (Max 1 test per location) Attached location gains: "The owner of Oddly Shaped Key automatically succeeds basic investigate actions here."

name: Stacked Deck
text:
Uses (0 supplies). Limit 10 supplies on Stacked Deck.
[reaction] After you spend resources to play a card: Place 1 supply on this card.

[action] Discard Stacked Deck: Move all supplies from it to your resource pool, as resources.

name: Discarded Evidence
text:
If you have an odd number of cards after playing Discarded Evidence, gain 2 resources and draw a card.

If you have an even number of cards after playing Discarded Evidence, gain 3 resources, you may discard a card to draw a card.

name: "Let Me See That!"
text: Use a [action] ability on an Item asset controlled by another investigator at your location, as if that asset was under your control. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: The First to Flinch
text: Group limit 1 The First to Flinch in play. Fast. Play after you draw a non-weakness treachery card, but before resolving that card's effects. Put The First to Flinch into play in your play area and attach that treachery to it instead of resolving it. Forced After an investigator fails a skill test on an encounter card, they draw the attached card. Then, discard The First to Flinch.

name: Unstable Terrain
text: Evade. Increase the difficulty of this test by 2. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this evade. If you succeed, you deal the evaded enemy 1 damage.

name: "Who's counting?"
text: Fight. Perform a Fight action using a Weapon asset you control with no ammo remaining, as if it had 1 ammo. If you succeed, place 1 ammo on the Weapon asset used. Otherwise, discard the Weapon asset and the enemy immediately attacks you.

name: Working the Angles
text:
Handlocked.
While commiting Working the Angles, if it was in
your hand's...

  - ...right half, Working the Angles gains a [willpower] icon.

  - ...left half, Working the Angles gains a [agility] icon.

  - ...middle position, Working the Angles gains "If this test is successful, draw 1 card."

name: Flawless Execution
text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.	
If this test was on an event card and is successful: Gain X resources, where X is the cost of the event card when you played it.

name: The Klabb
text: Handlocked. Uses (3 ammo). If The Klabb was the leftmost card in your hand before playing it: Place 3 additional ammo on The Klabb. [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this attack and you deal +1 damage. If you do not succeed by at least 1, remove 1 ammo from The Klabb.

name: Platinum Club
text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack for every 3 resources in your resource pool (Limit +5 [combat]). As an additional cost to initiate this ability, you may exhaust Platinum Club. If you do, you deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: Stacked Deck
text:
Uses (2 supplies). Limit 15 supplies on Stacked Deck.
[reaction] After you spend resources to play a card: Place 1 resource on this card. (Limit 15 resources)

[free] Discard Stacked Deck: Move all supplies from it to your resource pool, as resources.

name: Deal Closer
text: Handlocked. Fight. This attack deals +1 damage. If before playing Deal Closer, right of it was at least... - ...2 cards, Add your [agility] value to your skill value for this attack. - ...5 cards, this attack deals an additional +2 damage.

name: Royal Flush
text:
Handlocked. Fast. Royal Flush can only be played while it is the leftmost card in your hand.
Gain 2 resources, draw 2 cards, and you may take an additional 2 actions on your turn. Remove Royal Flush from the game.

name: Underworld Couriers
text:
Handlocked.
You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [agility].

At the start of each round, the cards currently in the leftmost and middle positions of your hand become the "Package", until they are played or the round ends.

[reaction] After you play a Package card: Gain 2 resources. You may exhaust Underworld Couriers to draw 1 card.

name: Celestial Inscriptions
text:
Uses (5 Charges)
[reaction] When a token with a non-negative modifier is revealed during a skill test at your location, spend 1 charge: Increase that token's modifier by +2 for this test. (Limit once per test.)

name: Rending
text: Uses (3 charges). If Rending has no charges, discard it or spend 1 resource to return it to your hand. [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat] and deals +1 damage. If you fail, remove 1 charge from Rending.

name: Trace Scrying
text: Uses (2 charges). If Trace Scrying has no charges, discard it or spend 2 resource to return it to your hand. [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect]. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue at this location. If you fail, remove 1 charge from Trace Scrying.

name: Flickering Memories
text: Investigate. Reduce the cost to play Flickering Memories by 1 or add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this investigation. If you succeed, you discover 1 additional clue at your location. After this test ends, if Flickering Memories cost less than 2 resource to play and used your [willpower] value in the skill test, you may shuffle it into your deck.

name: Recreation
text: Choose a card in your hand. Search the top 9 cards of your deck for up to 2 cards that share at least 1 trait with the chosen card, and draw them. Shuffle the chosen card into your deck.

name: Shockwave
text: Fight. Reduce the cost to play Shockwave by 1 or add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed, this attack deals +1 damage (+2 damage instead if the enemy is non-Elite). After this test ends, if Shockwave cost less than 2 resources to play and used your [willpower] value in the skill test, you may shuffle it into your deck.

name: Old Ideas, New Methods
text:
You get +1 [willpower] during this skill test.

If you succeed and this skill test used your [willpower] in any way: Heal 1 horror.

name: Infuse Strength
text:
Uses (2 Charges).

You may commit cards with [willpower] icons to any of your skill tests and those [willpower] icons boost your [willpower] value during that test.
[reaction] When a skill test you are performing on an event card, that does not use your [willpower] in any way begins, spend 1 charge: Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this test. If you succeed, place 1 charge on Infuse Strength.

flavor: "We can't run forever, but we can try."
name: Rewrite Fate
text: Fast. Play only during your turn. Uses (3 charges). Attach to an Ally asset you control (limit 1 per ally). Attached asset gets +2 health. [free] Spend 1 charge and exhaust Rewrite Fate: Shuffle a card in your hand into your deck. Draw a card. Forced When Rewrite Fate leaves play, take 1 horror.

name: Bend Reality
text:
Myriad. Fast. Play only during your turn.
Attach to your location or a connecting location. Group limit 3 in play. 

[free] Move an investigator at your location to a location with a Bend Reality attached to it. Discard this card or discard a card to shuffle Bend Reality into your deck.

name: Blessing From Above
text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.
If multiple chaos tokens were revealed during this skill test, you may return Blessing From Above to your hand after this test ends.

name: Shackles of the Deep
text: Exceptional. While there is only 1 non-Elite enemy engaged with you, they cannot make attacks of opportunity against you. When you move, non-Elite enemies disengage from you first. [action] Fight. This attack uses your [willpower] instead of [combat]. If before revealing a chaos token, your [combat] is within 2 skill value of your [willpower], then you get +4 [willpower] and deal +2 damage for this attack.

name: The Hanged Man · XII
text: You have 1 additional arcane slot. [reaction] After a Spell or Ritual asset you control leaves play, exhaust The Hanged Man · XII: Search the top 3 cards of your deck for a Spell or Ritual card. Draw it or play it (paying it cost).

name: Rending
text: Uses (4 charges). If Rending has no charges, discard it or shuffle it back into your deck. You may spend 1 resource to return it to your hand, instead. [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [willpower] instead of [combat]. You get +2 [willpower] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you fail, remove 1 charge from Rending.

name: Trace Scrying
text: Uses (3 charges). If Trace Scrying has no charges, discard it or shuffle it back into your deck. You may spend 2 resource to return it to your hand, instead. [action] Spend 1 charge: Investigate. Investigate using [willpower] instead of [intellect].You get +2 [willpower] for this test. If you succeed you discover 1 additional clue at this location. If you fail, remove 1 charge from Trace Scrying.

name: Hand Wraps
text: Uses (3 grit). You get +1 [combat] during basic fight actions. [reaction] After you defeat an enemy that you dealt at least 1 damage to with a basic fight action this round, spend 1 grit and exhaust Hand Wraps: Choose a level 0 Innate skill in your discard pile. Add the chosen skill to your hand.

name: Lucky Rabbit
text: [free] Discard Lucky Rabbit: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator searches the top 7 cards of his or her deck for a Item card, draws it, and shuffles his or her deck.

flavor: "Someones gotta keep this city from falling apart."
name: Maintenance Worker
text: [reaction] At the start of your turn, choose and discard a card from your hand and exhaust Maintenance Worker: Gain 1 resource.

name: Work Boots
text: Limit 1 Footwear per investigator. You get +2 [agility] during evade actions. [reaction] After you evade an enemy, exhaust Work Boots: Take a basic fight action against the evaded enemy.

name: Mysteries of the Forest
text: Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] during this skill test for each Creature card in your control and discard. If you succeed and have at least 3 total Creature cards in your control and discard, you discover 1 additional clue at your location.

name: Soul Searching
text: Investigate. This investigation uses your skill with the highest base value, instead of [intellect]. Add the value of one of your skills with the lowest base value to your skill value for this test. If you succeed, you may heal 1 damage or 1 horror.

name: Jumpy
text: You can only commit Jumpy during a basic evade action you are performing. If this skill test is successful, put Jumpy into play in your play area. You get +1 [agility]. Forced At the end of the round, if Jumpy is in play, shuffle it into your deck.

name: Nosy
text: You can only commit Nosy during a basic investigate action you are performing. If this skill test is successful, put Nosy into play in your play area. You get +1 [intellect]. Forced At the end of the round, if Nosy is in play, shuffle it into your deck.

name: Touchy
text: You can only commit Touchy during a basic fight action you are performing. If this skill test is successful, put Touchy into play in your play area. You get +1 [combat]. Forced At the end of the round, if Touchy is in play, shuffle it into your deck.

name: Survival Skills
text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing.

While Survival Skills is committed to a skill test, you get +2 to one of your skills ([willpower], [intellect], [combat], or [agility]) with the lowest base value.

flavor: "Someones gotta keep this city from falling apart."
name: Maintenance Worker
text: [reaction] At the start of your turn, choose and discard up to 2 cards from your hand and exhaust Maintenance Worker: Gain 1 resource. If you discarded 2 cards this way, draw a card.

name: Follow Through
text: Fast. Play when you would fail a skill test by 3 or less while performing a basic fight action. Cancel that attack. Take a Fight action on a card you control, against the same enemy. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage.

name: Hand Wrap
text: Uses (3 grit). You get +2 [combat] during basic fight actions. [reaction] After you defeat an enemy that you dealt at least 1 damage to with a basic fight action this round, spend 1 grit and exhaust Hand Wrap: Choose an Innate skill in your discard pile. Add the chosen skill to your hand.

name: Jumpy
text: You can only commit Jumpy during a basic evade action you are performing. If this skill test is successful, put Jumpy into play in your play area. You get +1 [agility] and you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to take a basic evade action. Forced At the end of the round, if Jumpy is in play, shuffle it into your deck.

name: Nosy
text: You can only commit Nosy during a basic investigate action you are performing. If this skill test is successful, put Nosy into play in your play area. You get +1 [intellect] and you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to take a basic investigate action. Forced At the end of the round, if Nosy is in play, shuffle it into your deck.

name: Touchy
text: You can only commit Touchy during a basic fight action you are performing. If this skill test is successful, put Touchy into play in your play area. You get +1 [combat] and you may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used to take a basic fight action. Forced At the end of the round, if Touchy is in play, shuffle it into your deck.

name: Goal Oriented
text:
This card is also a [seeker] level 0 card.
If this skill test is successful during an investigate, you may move 1 location toward a location with at least 1 clue.

If this skill test is successful during an attack, you may move 1 location toward a location with at least 1 enemy.

name: Shattered Timepiece
text: Exceptional. Uses (2 charges). [reaction] When a Non-Elite enemy would move into your location, exhaust Shattered Timepiece: That enemy enters your location exhausted. Place 1 charge on Shattered Timepiece. [free] Spend 1 charge: Choose an investigator or Non-Elite enemy at your location. Move them to a connecting location.

name: Look to the Stars
text:
This card is also a level 2 ([survivor]) card.
Fast. Play when an investigator at your location would fail a skill test after revealing a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder_thing] token. (Limit 1 Look to the Stars per test.)

That investigator gets +2 skill value for this test. Reveal another token. If this skill test fails, return Look to the Stars to your hand.

name: Mask of the Forgotten
text: Limit 1 Mask in play. You get -1 sanity. Enemies you target with player cards and abilities gain the Monster and Humanoid traits, if they didn't already have them, for the duration of the effect or ability.

name: Ring of Desire
text:
Limit 1 per investigator.
[reaction] After Ring of Desire enters play and at the start of each investigator phase, exhaust Ring of Desire and choose one of your skills with the lowest skill value: Increase the base value of that skill by 1 until the end of the next mythos phase.

name: Calm the Nerves
text:
If there are at least 2 Calm the Nerves in the victory display, Calm the Nerves gains [wild] [wild].
Choose an investigator at your location. They heal 1 horror. Add this card to the victory display.

name: Life Experience
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.

You may commit Life Experience to any type of test.
You get +1 [willpower], +1 [intellect], +1 [combat], and +1 [agility] for this skill test. 

If this test is successful, draw 1 card.

name: Circlet of Sealing
text: During the enemy phase, enemies at your location have -1 fight and -1 evade.

name: Essence of Humanity
text:
This card can only be purchased once by 1 investigator per campaign.
When the owner of this card would take trauma, cancel 1 of it and exile Essence of Humanity.

flavor: "I can feel them crawling under my skin!"
name: Delusional Parasitosis
text: Revelation Place Delusional Parasitosis into play in your threat area. Forced At the end of your turn: If there are no other investigators at your location, take 1 damage. Otherwise take 1 horror. [action] [action]: Discard Delusional Parasitosis.

name: Overshadowed
text: Revelation Place Overshadowed into play in your threat area. Forced At the end of your turn: If an enemy was defeated at your location, take 1 damage. Otherwise take 1 horror. [action] [action]: Discard Overshadowed.

name: Sword of the Last Crusader
text: [action] Fight. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed and a [eldersign] token was revealed this round, this attack deals an additional +1 damage. Any investigator may choose to use the following effect instead of their [eldersign] token's normal effect: [eldersign]: +1. The owner of this card may take an additional action this round, which can only be used to fight (limit once per round).

flavor: "Everything has a weakness if you look hard enough. It's usually being set on fire."
name: Infuse Element
text: Limit 1 per investigator. Evade. If you succeed, put Infuse Element into play in your play area. You get +1 [willpower]. Forced After you fail a skill test that uses [willpower] in any way: Shuffle Infuse Element into your deck.

name: Hatchet
text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If your last action you performed this turn was a basic fight or evade action, this attack deals +1 damage.

name: Hatchet
text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If your last action you performed this turn was a basic fight or evade action, this attack deals +1 damage. If you fail, ignore the [action] cost on this ability the next time you use it this round (limit once per round).

name: Down to Earth
text: [reaction] After you succeed a skill test during a basic action that you committed at least 1 skill to, exhaust Down to Earth: Search the top 6 cards of your deck of an Innate skill and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: The Final Flame
text: [reaction] After you shuffle at least 1 card from your hand, discard, or play area into your deck: Place 1 resource ( from the token pool ) on The Final Flame, as kindling. While The Final Flame has at least 4 kindling on it, reduce cost of events you play by 1.

name: Breaking your Limits
text:
Fast. Play only at the start of your turn.

Take 2 direct damage and horror. Raise the base value of your [combat] and [agility] to 6 during this round.

After enemies move during the next enemy phase, engage any number of enemies at your location. Then, when an enemy would attack you, you may immediately perform an action first.

name: Blood-Stained Ledger
text: Limit 1 per deck. Forced After Blood-Stained Ledger enter play: Search your bonded cards for Prowler and put it into play. When Blood-Stained Ledger leaves play, remove Learning the Prowler, Shadowfoot, and Master Thief from the game (even if they are out of play).

name: Prowler
text: Bonded (Blood-Stained Ledger). Uses (0 loot). [reaction] After you succeed an investigation by 1 or more : Place 1 loot on Prowler. Forced After the third loot is placed on Prowler: Move all loot to your resource pool, as resources. Search your bonded cards for Shadowfoot and put it into play. Remove Prowler from the game.

name: Shadowfoot
text: Bonded (Blood-Stained Ledger). Uses (0 loot). [reaction] After you succeed an investigation by 2 or more: Place 1 loot on Shadowfoot. Forced After the third loot is placed on Shadowfoot: Draw a card and move all loot to your resource pool, as resources. Search your bonded cards for Master Thief and put it into play. Remove Shadowfoot from the game.

name: Master Thief
text:
Bonded (Blood-Stained Ledger). Master Thief cannot be discarded.
You get +1 skill value while investigating and evading.

[reaction] After you succeed an investigation by 4 or more, exhaust Master Thief: Gain 3 resources and draw a card.

name: Cautious
text:
You may play the card attached to Cautious as if it were in your hand.
[free] If there is not a card attached to Cautious, exhaust Cautious: Attach a non-weakness player card from your hand to Cautious.

name: Undercover Agent
text:
Playing this card does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
[reaction] After Undercover Agent enters play: You get +1 [combat] until the end of the round.

[reaction] After you defeat an enemy with at least 3 health, discard Undercover Agent: Discover 1 clue at your location.

name: Plague Doctor
text:
Playing this card does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
[reaction] After Plague Doctor enters play: You get +1 [intellect] until the end of the round.

[reaction] After your turn begins or ends, deal 1 horror to Plague Doctor: Heal 1 damage from an investigator at your location.

name: Underworld Assasin
text:
Playing this card does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
[reaction] After Underworld Assasin enters play: You get +1 [agility] until the end of the round.

[reaction] After your turn begins or ends, deal 1 damage to this card: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.

name: Wayward Pilgrim
text:
Playing this card does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
[reaction] After Wayward Pilgrim enters play: You get +1 [willpower] until the end of the round.

[reaction] After your turn begins or ends, discard Wayward Pilgrim: Move to a connecting location with clues on it.

name: Ship Captain
text:
Playing this card does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
[reaction] After Ship Captain enters play: Move to a connecting location.

[reaction] After your turn begins or ends, discard Ship Captain: Move an investigator at a connecting location to your location.

name: Agent of the Order
text:
You get +1 [combat].
[reaction] When you play Agent of the Order: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location. If an enemy was defeated this way, Agent of the Order gains fast.

[reaction] After you fail an attack by 2 or less, exhaust Agent of the Order: You get +1 [agility] this round. You may immediately perform an evade action.

name: The Damned
text:
[reaction] When an investigator at your location initiates a skill test, deal 1 damage or horror to The Damned: Reduce the difficulty of that test by 2 (limit once per test).

[reaction] After your turn ends: Heal 1 damage or horror from The Damned.
